attributes.action: MP's should not visit or justify terrorist groups for political gain
attributes.background: Politician should not visit terrorist groups or justify terrorism for political gain. To undermine  democracy or the soldiers upholding it. Giving credence to terrorism stops terrorist from coming to the negotiating table sooner and leads to more violence.

rejection.details: It's up to individual MPs to decide who they meet, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
